title: Sample Location
description: Group of ids and names that represent where the sample was taken from.

cellularComponentTermId.description: the id that represents a part, or the entire, expression statement.

anatomicalStructureTermId.description: This is an anatomical structure, not a cell type.

anatomicalStructureQualifierTermId.description: anatomicalStructureQualifierTermId is only valid when used in conjunction with the nonCellAnatomicalStructureTermId.

anatomicalSubStructureTermId.description: This anatomical substructure is a part of the nonCellAnatomicalStructureTermId.  It can only exist if nonCellAnatomicalStructureTermId is populated.

anatomicalSubStructureQualifierTermId.description: cellularComponentTermId, anatomicalSubStructureTermId, and spatialTermId are mutually exclusive.  spatialTermId is only valid when used in conjunction with the nonCellAnatomicalStructureTermId.

whereExpressedStatement.description: use to provide a human-readable text display for the combination of one to many ontology terms coded in the whereExpressedTermIdentifiers collection, used as a convenience to reduce code duplication.
